Collections.rule:
Individual: @A*(mm:replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]",""))
Types: ExperimentSite
Facts: 	hasState @C*,
	hasTier @F*(mm:prepend("Tier")),
	hasStatus @D*,
	hasCountry @D*,
	hasVOName @E*

Individual: @A*(mm:replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]",""))
Types: Site
Facts:	hasCountry @B*,
	hasFederation @C*,
	hasTier @D*(mm:prepend("Tier")),
	hasStatus @E*,
	hasState @F*

Individual: @A*(mm:replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]",""))
Types: Federation
Facts: 	hasAccountingName @B*,
	hasTier @C*(mm:prepend("Tier")),
	hasCountry @E*
